item.title: GEFCom2017 tutorial: part 1
item.description: Caveat Emptor!: This is a work in progress! I’m refactoring the original code I wrote. Trying to find a nice balance between wrapping functions up in my gefcom2017 package and using existing R packages such as purrr. This post has been uploaded early so I can include a link in the paper. Introduction This post shows how to implement the model I propose in the paper “Reconciled boosted models for GEFCom2017 hierarchical probabilistic load forecasting”.
